Also, is there a picture or two somewhere? I am much better at visual to see if I have it correct!
  Thanks,
  Elise
  

Bill <bill@...> wrote:
             
  Power and ground on the top board, 5 & 6 wire to the lower board  
  were the key pad goes.
   
      Board Connections:
  - to ground **see above
  1 cathode side of led **optional (short lead )
  2 NC
  3Anode side of led ** optional ( long lead )
  4 NC
  5 to lcd board keypad pin #1 ** See above
  6 to lcd board keypad pin #3 ** See above
  + to power ** see above
  

  ** Note that as in the simple hack the mute pin must be removed 
  ** Led is optional and included! It will flash when either the increase or decrease delay has been meet
   

    ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Marlboro63@... 
  To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Tuesday, December 11, 2007 10:20 AM
  Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] UPRADE YOUR HACK BOX FOR FREE!
  

      I have a simple question.  When I pull the boards apart I just have to solder 2 wired.  One to pin one ground and the other to pin 3 battery and then just put the 2 boards back together?
   
  Jeff
